name: warden-dilemma
description: A platform for studying strategic behavior in N-player iterated prisoner's dilemma games

scripts.dev:separate: concurrently "pnpm --filter warden-dilemma-server dev" "VITE_COLYSEUS_URL=ws://localhost:3000 VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:3000/warden_dilemma/api pnpm --filter warden-dilemma-client dev"
scripts.test: pnpm --filter warden-dilemma-server test && pnpm --filter warden-dilemma-client test
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter warden-dilemma-server clean && pnpm --filter warden-dilemma-client clean
